tool_description: When all you need is just the current USD crypto price and nothing else.
name: Savvy Crypto Price
title: Savvy Crypto Price

api_list.name: getPolygon
api_list.description: This endpoint returns current USD price for Polygon
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://savvy-crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com/polygon"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "savvy-crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
